channel.title: Teachings on IRISA/INRIA DiverSE Team
channel.description: Recent content in Teachings on IRISA/INRIA DiverSE Team

item.title: Mobile Application Modeling
item.description: In this course, I am teaching specifics of Mobile Applications in terms of modeling activities. This course is taugh since 2015.

item.title: Modern Applications Production
item.description: In this course, I am teaching modern tools to produce professional applications (git, build, tests, CI, project management, …) in the context of the application of the Scrum agile method. This course is taught since 2017.
